code: import{http,isExpired,HTTP_TOKEN,REJECT_MSG}from'./http';export var fetchVersion=function fetchVersion(tokenLogin){var options={"Token":tokenLogin!==null&&tokenLogin!==void 0?tokenLogin:HTTP_TOKEN,"Esquema":"web","Tabela":"VersaoSistema"};return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var ret=http.get("Versao/VersaoSistema",options);if(isExpired(ret)){reject(REJECT_MSG);}resolve(ret);});};export var fetchHomolog=function fetchHomolog(tokenLogin){var options={"Token":tokenLogin!==null&&tokenLogin!==void 0?tokenLogin:HTTP_TOKEN,"Esquema":"web","Tabela":"VersaoHomologacao"};return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var ret=http.post("Versao/VersaoHomologacao",options);if(isExpired(ret)){reject(REJECT_MSG);}resolve(ret);});};
